data.title: Top 25 most popular Mexican actresses you should know in 2024
data.meta_description: Who are the most popular Mexican actresses you should know and watch? Check out this article to find out who they are and much more about their lives.
data.text:
The most popular Mexican actresses have appeared in high-grossing films and shows. They are talented and skilled in their acting craft. Besides, they are beautiful. Their success in the entertainment industry inspires many aspiring actresses to continue working hard to achieve their wildest dreams.

TABLE OF CONTENTS

Overview of the most popular Mexican actresses

Most popular Mexican actresses:

1. Salma Hayek

2. Ana De La Reguera

3. Yalitza Aparicio

4. Lupita Nyong'o

5. Patricia Manterola

6. Sara Ramirez

7. Sandra Echeverría

8. Melissa Barrera

9. Teresa Ruiz

10. Eiza González

Who are the famous Mexican actresses from the 50s?

Who is the most famous Mexican actress?

Who are the most famous Mexican actresses in their 20s?

Who is a famous Latina actress?

Who is a famous Mexican celebrity?

This list of the most popular Mexican actresses is in no particular order. It includes seasoned actresses of Mexican heritage who have made indelible marks in the entertainment industry, including Hollywood.

Overview of the most popular Mexican actresses

Most popular Mexican actresses:

Mexico is home to some of the most famous and talented actresses in the world. Here is a look at the gifted and beautiful Mexican celebrities you should know about in 2024.

1. Salma Hayek

Full name: Salma Hayek Pinault

Date of birth: 2 September 1966

Age: 57 years (as of June 2024)

Place of birth: Coatzacoalcos, Mexico

Salma Hayek Pinault is among the most popular female Mexican actresses today. She started her career in Mexico, starring in the telenovela Teresa and the drama Midaq Alley. Salma Hayek established herself in Hollywood by appearing in multiple films, including Desperado, From Dusk till Dawn, Dogma, and Wild Wild West.

2. Ana De La Reguera

Full name: Anabell Gardoqui de la Reguera

Date of birth: 8 April 1977

Age: 47 years (as of June 2024)

Place of birth: Heroica Veracruz, Mexico

Ana De La Reguera is among the most popular Mexican actresses of all time. She has starred in telenovelas, films, and television series. Ana De La Reguera is primarily known for her role in the HBO television series Eastbound & Down and Capadocia.

3. Yalitza Aparicio

Full name: Yalitza Aparicio Martínez

Date of birth: 11 December 1993

Age: 30 years (as of June 2024)

Place of birth: Tlaxiaco, Mexico

Yalitza Aparicio Martínez is an actress and preschool teacher. She made her movie debut as Cleo in the 2018 drama Roma. As a result of her impressive skills, Yalitza Aparicio earned a nomination for the Academy Award for Best Actress.

4. Lupita Nyong'o

Full name: Lupita Amondi Nyong'o

Date of birth: 1 March 1983

Age: 41 years (as of June 2024)

Place of birth: Mexico City, Mexico

Lupita Amondi Nyong'o is a Kenyan-Mexican actress. She is the recipient of several accolades, including an Academy Award and nominations for two Primetime Emmy Awards. Lupita Nyong'o is famous for her role in Black Panther.

5. Patricia Manterola

Full name: Patricia Manterola

Date of birth: 23 April 1972

Age: 52 years (as of June 2024)

Place of birth: Mexico City, Mexico

Patricia Manterola is a Mexican singer and actress. She is ranked among the best Mexican novela actresses. She has starred in telenovelas and films such as The Perfect Game, Lavoe, and El Fantasma de Elena. Patricia Manterola made her acting debut with ¿Dónde Quedó La Bolita? in 1993.

6. Sara Ramirez

Full name: Sara Elena Ramírez Vargas

Date of birth: 31 August 1975

Age: 48 years (as of June 2024)

Place of birth: Mazatlán, Sinaloa, Mexico

Sara Elena Ramírez is a Mexican actress in Hollywood. She was born in Mazatlán, Sinaloa, but moved to the United States at eight years old. She graduated with a fine arts degree from the Juilliard School. Sara Ramirez appeared as Dr. Callie Torres in 239 episodes of Grey's Anatomy.

7. Sandra Echeverría

Full name: Sandra Echeverría Gamboa

Date of birth: 11 December 1984

Age: 39 years (as of June 2024)

Place of birth: Mexico City, Distrito Federal, Mexico

Sandra Echeverría is an actress and producer. She is known for Savages, La Usurpadora, and Soñarás. She is the daughter of Mario Echeverría and Sara Antoniata. Sandra Echeverría released the album Instinto in 2019.

8. Melissa Barrera

Full name: Melissa Barrera Martínez

Date of birth: 4 July 1990

Age: 33 years (as of June 2024)

Place of birth: Monterrey, Mexico

Melissa Barrera Martínez is a renowned Mexican actress. She is known for roles in the telenovelas Siempre tuya Acapulco and Tanto amor. She started her career in 2011 and has remained active ever since. Melissa Barrera has been featured in several movies and television series.

9. Teresa Ruiz

Full name: Teresa Ruiz López

Date of birth: 21 December 1988

Age: 35 years (as of June 2024)

Place of birth: Santiago Matatlan, Mexico

Teresa Ruiz López is a Mexican-American actress. She is best known for portraying cartel queen Isabella Bautista in the first two seasons of Narcos: Mexico. She is a talented actress who was trained at the Actors Studio. Teresa Ruiz has been awarded several Best Actress awards internationally. She is a Lifetime Member of the Actors Studio

10. Eiza González

Full name: Eiza González Reyna

Date of birth: 30 January 1990

Age: 34 years (as of June 2024)

Place of birth: Mexico City, Mexico

Eiza González Reyna is a Mexican actress and singer. She gained fame for her debut role as Lola Valente in the Mexican musical telenovela Lola. She is the daughter of Glenda Reyna and Carlos González. As a singer, Eiza González has released the albums Contracorriente and Te Acordarás de Mí.

11. Paola Núñez

Full name: Paola Núñez Rivas

Date of birth: 8 April 1978

Age: 46 years (as of June 2024)

Place of birth: Tecate, Mexico

Paola Núñez Rivas is a Mexican actress and producer. She is one of the most famous actresses born in Mexico. She started her acting career when she was 12 years old. Paola Núñez moved from her small town of Tecate to Mexico City to begin her professional career.

12. Kate del Castillo

Full name: Kate del Castillo Negrete Trillo

Date of birth: 23 October 1972

Age: 51 years (as of June 2024)

Place of birth: Mexico City, Mexico

Kate del Castillo Negrete Trillo is a Mexican-American actress. She came into the limelight because of her lead role in the telenovela Muchachitas in 1991. Kate del Castillo is also the producer of telenovelas like Dariela los martes and Detrás del Poder.

13. Karol Sevilla

Full name: Karol Itzitery Piña Cisneros

Date of birth: 9 November 1999

Age: 24 years (as of June 2024)

Place of birth: Mexico City, Mexico

Karol Itzitery Piña Cisneros is known professionally as Karol Sevilla. She is one of the most popular Latina actresses under 30. She is also a singer and songwriter. Karol Sevilla started her career as a child in the Latin American telenovela La Rosa De Guadalupe.

14. Ana Serradilla

Full name: Ana Isabel Serradilla García

Date of birth: 9 August 1978

Age: 45 years (as of June 2024)

Place of birth: Mexico City, Mexico

Ana Isabel Serradilla García is a Mexican actress. She is known for her roles in television series such as La Viuda Negra and Drenaje Profundo. Ana Serradilla also starred in the Mexican version of Desperate Housewives.

15. Jacqueline Bracamontes

Full name: Jacqueline Bracamontes Van Hoorde

Date of birth: 23 December 1979

Age: 44 years old (as of June 2024)

Place of birth: Guadalajara, Mexico

Jacqueline Bracamontes is a Mexican actress, former model, and beauty pageant titleholder. She won Nuestra Belleza Jalisco 2000 and Nuestra Belleza México 2000. Jacqueline Bracamontes is one of the Latina actresses in their 40s.

16. Ana Claudia Talancón

Full name: Ana Claudia Talancón

Date of birth: 1 May 1980

Age: 44 years (as of June 2024)

Place of birth: Cancún, Mexico

Ana Claudia Talancón is an actress, TV host, and philanthropist. She started studying acting in Cancún with the Cuban professor Albio Paz. She later moved to Mexico City to continue her studies. Ana Claudia Talancón is best known for her roles in Al norte del Corazón, Señora, and Amor Latino Romántica obsesión.

17. Stephanie Sigman

Full name: Stephanie Sigman Conde

Date of birth: 28 February 1987

Age: 37 years (as of June 2024)

Place of birth: Ciudad Obregón, Mexico

Stephanie Sigman is a Mexican-American actress. Her breakthrough role was in the 2011 Mexican crime drama film Miss Bala. She has also been featured in other top-rated movies and television series, including Pioneer, Spectre, Going Under, and Annabelle: Creation. In 2017, Stephanie Sigman began playing Jessica Cortez, captain and commanding officer of the LAPD Metropolitan Division in S.W.A.T.

18. Alessandra Rosaldo

Full name: Alessandra Rosaldo

Date of birth: 11 September 1971

Age: 52 years (as of June 2024)

Place of birth: Mexico City, Mexico

Alessandra Rosaldo is a Mexican actress, singer, and dancer. She has played main and supporting roles in Mexican TV’s soap operas. Alessandra Rosaldo is one of the most well-known television and film stars in Mexico.

19. Maite Perroni

Full name: Maite Perroni Beorlegui

Date of birth: 9 March 1983

Age: 41 years (as of June 2024)

Place of birth: Mexico City, Mexico

Maite Perroni Beorlegui is an actress, singer, songwriter, and producer. She gained international fame in 2004 as a member of the Latin Grammy-nominated Latin pop group RBD. She started her career in 2004, and since then, she has starred in numerous films and television series. Maite Perroni is more recently known for starring in the Mexican telenovela Rebelde and Dark Desire.

20. Camila Sodi

Full name: Camila Ía González Sodi

Date of birth: 14 May 1986

Age: 38 years (as of June 2024)

Place of birth: Mexico City, Mexico

Camila Sodi is a Mexican singer, actress, and model. She is best known for series such as Falsa Identidad and Rubí. Camila Sodi is the niece of entertainer Thalía and part of the famed Sodi family.

21. Thalía

Full name: Ariadna Thalía Sodi Miranda

Date of birth: 6 August 1971

Age: 52 years (as of June 2024)

Place of birth: Mexico City, Mexico

Ariadna Thalía Sodi Miranda, known mononymously as Thalía, is a singer, songwriter, and actress. Referred to as the Queen of Latin Pop, she is considered one of the most successful artists. Thalía Sodi was cast in a supporting role in the 1986 telenovela Pobre señorita Limantour with which she began her collaboration with Televisa.

22. Sara Maldonado

Full name: Sara Maldonado Fuentes

Date of birth: 10 March 1980

Age: 44 years (as of June 2024)

Place of birth: Xalapa, Mexico

Actress Sara Maldonado Fuentes is best known as Lorena Alvarez from El juego de la vida, which was her first telenovela. She later became the protagonist in teenage soap operas like Clase 406 and Corazones al límite.

23. Aislinn Derbez

Full name: Aislinn González Michel

Date of birth: 18 March 1986

Age: 38 years (as of June 2024)

Place of birth: Mexico City, Mexico

Aislinn González Michel is the daughter of actors Eugenio Derbez and Gabriela Michel. She has been featured in many shows and movies, including Served Cold, Te presento a Laura, Macho, Estar o no estar, and Win It All. Aislinn González Michel has been on the cover page of several magazines.

24. Elizabeth Cervantes

Full name: Elizabeth Cervantes

Date of birth: 1 August 1973

Age: 50 years (as of June 2024)

Place of birth: Mexico City, Mexico

Elizabeth Cervantes is an actress of films and soap operas. She studied acting in Casa del Teatro and Centro de Formacion Actoral of TV Azteca. Elizabeth Cervantes has been featured in Mas que a nada en el mundo, Fuera del cielo, Febrer, and Volverás, among many other shows and movies.

25. Montserrat Oliver

Full name: Montserrat Oliver

Date of birth: 13 April 1966

Age: 58 years (as of June 2024)

Place of birth: Monterrey, Mexico

Montserrat Oliver is a fashion model, entrepreneur, actress, and talk show host. Early in her career, she moved to Miami, where she modelled for magazines such as Elle and Top Model. After several years in America, Montserrat Oliver returned to Mexico City where she appeared in Ramona, the first of many telenovelas she has been featured in.

Who are the famous Mexican actresses from the 50s?

Popular Mexican actresses from the 50s include María de los Ángeles Félix Güereña and Katy Jurado.

Who is the most famous Mexican actress?

The most famous Mexican actresses include Salma Hayek, Ana de la Reguera, Kate del Castillo, Montserrat Oliver, and Elizabeth Cervantes.

Who are the most famous Mexican actresses in their 20s?

Famous Mexican actresses in their 20s include Allegra Acosta, Adrianna Di Liello, Auli’i Cravalho, Rachel Zegler, and Lilimar Hernandez.

Who is a famous Latina actress?

Famous Latina actresses include Salma Hayek, Ana de la Reguera, Kate del Castillo, Alessandra Rosaldo, Yalitza Aparicio, Patricia Manterola, Montserrat Oliver, and Elizabeth Cervantes.

Who is a famous Mexican celebrity?

Famous Mexican celebrities include Salma Hayek, Ana de la Reguera, Kate del Castillo, Alessandra Rosaldo, Yalitza Aparicio, Patricia Manterola, Montserrat Oliver, and Elizabeth Cervantes.

The most famous Mexican actresses have won the hearts of movie viewers because of their impressive skills and beauty. They have been featured in multiple movies and television within and outside Mexico.

Tuko.co.ke recently published a list of the most famous people in the world. The world has witnessed the rise of numerous celebrities.

From Hollywood actors to sports icons, musicians, and influencers. These individuals have amassed a big following and fan bases over time.

Source: TUKO.co.ke
